channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Ninja Job Board – Ultimate WordPress Job Board Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Ninja Job Board – Ultimate WordPress Job Board Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-2544|2024-08-03T00:39:08.036Z -- unknown -- ninja%20job%20board%20%E2%80%93%20ultimate%20wordpress%20job%20board%20plugin
item.description: The Ninja Job Board WordPress plugin before 1.3.3 does not protect the directory where it stores uploaded resumes, making it vulnerable to unauthenticated Directory Listing which allows the download of uploaded resumes.
